item.description: Real-time physically-based graphics engine in Vulkan, c++23

item.title: Dynamic rendering in Vulkan 1.3
item.description: Exploring dynamic rendering feature of Vulkan 1.3 which aims to simplify rendering by removing need for VkRenderPass and VkFramebuffer objects
